caption.p: Module-pathway regulatory network and AUC analysis. Scatterplot of module membership vs. gene significance ( A). Global regulatory network of blue and turquoise modules ( B): red represents high expression; blue and yellow indicate low expression; node size indicates the degree of gene connectivity. Enrichment analyses of BDNF intersection pathways ( C): yellow indicates the low BDNF expression. Performance evaluation of low BDNF in HD prediction ( D). AUC: area under the curve, HD: Huntingtonâ€™s disease.
